attributes.action: All retail shops should be closed on Boxing Day
attributes.additional_details: Because it's only right retail workers get to spend time with their family to over Christmas and not just Christmas Day
attributes.background: Require all retail shops to close on Boxing Day like they do Christmas Day to give retail workers the 2 days off

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want all shops to be required to close, or for the rules on Boxing Day to be the same as for Christmas Day where small shops are able to remain open. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
